comments:

Could you please let us know which version of TPTP you use, and on which platform?
Also, any additional details on how to reproduce this problem would be appreciate it.
Thanks
Christophe

Please provide TPTP information in order to reproduce.
(Schedule -> User Group) are not part of TPTP (but RPT).
The stack trace you attached doesn't contain line information.

In such situation (no way to reproduce and no line info) it is impossible to investigate and fix.

Thanks in advance
Please target to 4.4 and review the priority according to http://www.eclipse.org/tptp/home/documents/process/development/bugzilla.html.

Bianca, I think this defect is related to the Test Log viewer.
Thanks

ACTION ITEM:  Please target to 4.4 and review the priority according to
http://www.eclipse.org/tptp/home/documents/process/development/bugzilla.html by the end of 4.3 i3 (Friday, November 3, 2006).

From the initial description this seems a problem from a consuming product of TPTP  although the exception happens inside TPTP. Please provide more details on how to reproduce this problem if it happens using TPTP directly. If this problem is from using a consuming product, please open a defect against the product.  Thanks.
Reporter: Please verify and close in preparation for shutting down the TPTP 4.4 release.  Thanks.

Closing by default since not verified/closed by the originator in the 6+ months since being resolved.  

Please reopen if the issue is still present in the latest TPTP release or the
resolution is not correct.
